name: device-address-proxy-table-entry
description: Represents an entry in the device address proxy table, containing network address information and the last I-Am message received from a device.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The network address of the BACnet device.

fields.name: i-am
fields.description: The last I-Am message received from this device.

fields.name: last-i-am-time
fields.description: The date and time when the last I-Am message was received.
